task.summary: Default task
Finished quering-part: all crypto exchange rates, which are not linked to a foreign currency are queried and updated into the db. For new exchange pairs a new tables is automatically created.
minor changes. mostly comments
added framework foraccount information and traders.
getting the traders to work....
added a basic trader, as an example
minor changes, only to be up to date.
added logging functionality to the populateDB routines (good, if the script is called via cron-job)
further process, not really there yet
further process, not really there yet
simulator works for single buy advices, needs to be adapted to multiple advices.
added a json file which stores all the trader's constants. optimizing the algorithm (and storing the optimal solution) becomes easier
started gradient search
added a basic stepest descent algorithm
write new values out to file. is NOT yet working
small further changes, trader is no called via argument on script call
ma_trader is now working (more or less), sanity checks should be done...
added some better account functionality... no big changes
code refactoring, added starting balance for simulation to all currencies = 1
added sorted trading to the analyzer. -> way better performance.
code refactored, added better analysis insights, gave the trader account overview.
better output for simulation and optimization, small changes towards preforming real trades
fixed some bugs, nicer loggings. finally able to really trade. v1.0 is out
better trading constants
added more logging information, when trade fails.
nicer logging informations....
